[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /std/shops/bank.c

This is the bank inheritable. It handles all the bank transactions and other such exciting stuff.

Written by Pinkfish

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /std/room/basic_room.c

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/move_failures.h, /include/shops/bank.h and /include/money.h
